example_en: Air pollution is a big problem.
Biodiversity is important for the planet.
We make compost from food scraps.
This forest is a habitat for many animals.
We need to reduce car emissions.
The wildlife in Africa is amazing.
The ocean is full of plastic.
We need to protect the forests.
Don't dump toxic waste in the river.
Soil erosion is a serious problem.
I love spending time in nature.
Turn off the lights to save electricity.
Install solar panels on your roof.
Wind energy is clean and sustainable.
Coal is the dirtiest fossil fuel.
Natural gas is cleaner than coal.
This is a protected nature reserve.
Sustainability is key to our future.
The Kyoto Protocol addressed climate change.
Coral reefs are dying from bleaching.
Plants use photosynthesis to produce oxygen.
Too much phosphorus causes algae growth.
example_ka: ძალიან ბევრი ფოსფორი წყალმცენარის ზრდას იწვევს.

example_en: Small animals are prey for larger ones.
Rabbits are herbivores that eat plants.
example_ka: კურდღლები ბალახისმჭამელები არიან, რომლებიც მცენარეებს ჭამენ.

example_en: Lions are carnivores that hunt for meat.
example_ka: ლომები ხორცისმჭამელები არიან, რომლებიც ხორცს ნადირობენ.

example_en: Humans are omnivores eating plants and meat.
example_ka: ადამიანები ყველაფრისმჭამელები არიან და მცენარეებსა და ხორცს ჭამენ.

example_en: Bacteria are decomposers that recycle nutrients.
example_ka: ბაქტერიები დამშლელები არიან, რომლებიც საკვებ ნივთიერებებს გადამუშავებენ.

example_en: Bees and flowers live in symbiosis.
Bears sleep through hibernation in winter.
Animals use camouflage to hide from predators.
Evolution helps species adapt to changes.
Monsoons bring vital water to crops.
Deserts are expanding due to climate change.
Estuaries are nurseries for marine life.
River deltas are rich in nutrients.
Glaciers are melting due to warming.
Icebergs provide fresh water when melted.
The ozone layer is in the stratosphere.
Earth's magnetosphere protects us from radiation.
All life exists within the biosphere.
The hydrosphere includes all water on Earth.
The lithosphere is Earth's solid outer layer.
The geosphere includes rocks and minerals.
The cryosphere includes all frozen water.
Ice has a high albedo reflecting sunlight.
example_ka: ყინულს მაღალი ალბედო აქვს და მზის სხივებს ირბენს.

example_en: Light has a visible spectrum of colors.
Blue light has a shorter wavelength.
example_ka: ლურჯ შუქს უფრო მოკლე ტალღის სიგრძე აქვს.

example_en: Plants use light absorption for photosynthesis.
Condensation forms clouds in the sky.
Rain is the most common precipitation.
Water alkalinity buffers against acid rain.
Fish use buoyancy to control depth.
Heat radiation from Earth escapes to space.
